That should not cause any problems--it's just an old cache file for doing active search on bug reports.  I deleted that code since we will rely on the common offline storate if we restore this functionality.

So, I won't see those errors in the log anymore? How about jira issues?

PS: I wonder if stack trace can be formatted any better then that...

Yup, you won't see them anymore.  I deleted that entire mechanism (old serialization stuff was failing).

Yes, we need to get the stack traces formatting better.  Should be able to do that once we can get line wrap working better, it's on Rob's list for 0.5.3.  For now you could make your font smaller.
